summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from Thurman Street to a point approximately 450 feet south thereof, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12426 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
